item.title: [Delta]Various Tutorials[Delta]
item.dc:creator: @king_rauddys2 king_rauddys
item.description:
@king_rauddys2 wrote:

I found a error in your code:

for(int i : cannotSpawn) {
if(element == newItemID) {
sM(“You may not spawn this item.”);
return;
}

why do you use (element == newItemID) ?

you declare int i : cannotSpawn…

Make:

(i = newItemID)

Nice tutorials

-Rauddys

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta]Various Tutorials[Delta]
item.dc:creator: @defyant17 defyant17
item.description:
@defyant17 wrote:

I get some crazy printOut in the Run.cmd window. I deleted the idle time, and added a server message… one of those are causing it.

This is what i get:

Starting System... Enforcing client requirement. Settings Loaded Seccessfully! Online. Handlers Finished Loading Connection from [ Took out my IP..Lol] [client-1-Tdgfg]: Loading Process Completed [Regular player, lag: 3 ms] [client-1-Tdgfg]: blah=255, part2=317, part3=0, part4=0 [client-1-Tdgfg]: blah=255, part2=317, part3=0, part4=0 [client-1-Tdgfg]: blah=255, part2=317, part3=0, part4=0 [client-1-Tdgfg]: blah=255, part2=317, part3=0, part4=0 [client-1-Tdgfg]: blah=255, part2=317, part3=0, part4=0 [client-1-Tdgfg]: blah=255, part2=317, part3=0, part4=0 [client-1-Tdgfg]: blah=255, part2=317, part3=0, part4=0 [client-1-Tdgfg]: blah=255, part2=317, part3=0, part4=0 [client-1-Tdgfg]: blah=255, part2=317, part3=0, part4=0 [client-1-Tdgfg]: blah=0, part2=317, part3=0, part4=0 [client-1-Tdgfg]: blah=0, part2=317, part3=0, part4=0 [client-1-Tdgfg]: blah=0, part2=317, part3=0, part4=0 [client-1-Tdgfg]: blah=0, part2=317, part3=0, part4=0 [client-1-Tdgfg]: blah=0, part2=317, part3=0, part4=0 [client-1-Tdgfg]: blah=0, part2=317, part3=0, part4=0 [client-1-Tdgfg]: blah=129, part2=26089, part3=-1949781980, part4=-599775493 [client-1-Tdgfg]: blah=129, part2=26089, part3=-1949781980, part4=-599775493 [client-1-Tdgfg]: blah=129, part2=26089, part3=-1949781980, part4=-599775493 [client-1-Tdgfg]: blah=129, part2=26089, part3=-1949781980, part4=-599775493 [client-1-Tdgfg]: blah=129, part2=26089, part3=-1949781980, part4=-599775493 [client-1-Tdgfg]: blah=129, part2=26089, part3=-1949781980, part4=-599775493 [client-1-Tdgfg]: blah=129, part2=26089, part3=-1949781980, part4=-599775493 [client-1-Tdgfg]: blah=129, part2=26089, part3=-1949781980, part4=-599775493 [client-1-Tdgfg]: blah=129, part2=26089, part3=-1949781980, part4=-599775493

That is maybe 10 seconds of the server running… Null also prints…
Got anything i can do?
Thanks

item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Yes it will work with bolts, you just have to add it yourself.

Where at the top do we add that? Cause uhh, I get errors, lol. So yeah, you should be a little more specific about that. :P[/quote]

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
